title: Condensed Sans Serif font
content:
Hello,

I'm trying to identify this font. The closest I can find is [Novecento Sans Cond SemiBold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725045019/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento/cond-demibold/) but it's not quite right. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725045019im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-18%20at%2012_4552.31.54.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-06-18 at 12.31.54.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725045019/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-18%20at%2012.31.54.png) | 128.24 KB |
author: tompman

comments.content:
It is very close. The only difference I'm noticing is the angle of the legs on the 'K'.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725045019im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-18%20at%2013_4745.40.18.png)

It's actually an older release of the same font. If you can find **Novecento Cond Medium** released on either 2011 or 2012, you'll see it's a perfect match.  
(See the image bellow)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725045019im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wicked-01_4504.jpg)
